title: The Prince
description: Penny doesn't dream about a prince coming to save her from the trailer park. She knows better than that.And the boy she finds hiding in the woods out back is too wild and dangerous to trust. But he may be her only chance at survival.From New York Times bestselling author Skye Warren comes an emotional new spin-off series. THE PRINCE is a 13,000-word prologue to the new Masterpiece duet.
author: Skye Warren
